Sentencas: Protective coatings are needed for metallic interconnects used in solid oxide fuel cell (SOFC) stacks to prevent excessive high-temperature oxidation and evaporation of chromium species.
Titulo: Development and Application of HVOF Sprayed Spinel Protective Coating for SOFC Interconnects

Sentencas: These phenomena affect the lifetime of the stacks by increasing the area-specific resistance (ASR) and poisoning of the cathode.
Titulo: Development and Application of HVOF Sprayed Spinel Protective Coating for SOFC Interconnects

Sentencas: Protective MnCo2O4 and MnCo1.8Fe0.2O4 coatings were applied on ferritic steel interconnect material (Crofer 22 APU) by high velocity oxy fuel spraying.
Titulo: Development and Application of HVOF Sprayed Spinel Protective Coating for SOFC Interconnects

Sentencas: The substrate-coating systems were tested in long-term exposure tests to investigate their high-temperature oxidation behavior.
Titulo: Development and Application of HVOF Sprayed Spinel Protective Coating for SOFC Interconnects

Sentencas: Additionally, the ASRs were measured at 700 degrees C for 1000 h. Finally, a real coated interconnect was used in a SOFC single-cell stack for 6000 h. Post-mortem analysis was carried out with scanning electron microscopy.
Titulo: Development and Application of HVOF Sprayed Spinel Protective Coating for SOFC Interconnects

Sentencas: The deposited coatings reduced significantly the oxidation of the metal, exhibited low and stable ASR and reduced effectively the migration of chromium.
Titulo: Development and Application of HVOF Sprayed Spinel Protective Coating for SOFC Interconnects
